actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend section 9006 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for funding of the Federal Election Commission from amounts designated for the Presidential Election Campaign Fund under section 6096 of such code.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for funding of the Federal Election Commission from amounts designated on income tax returns for the Presidential Election Campaign Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 9006 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for funding of the Federal Election Commission from amounts designated for the Presidential Election Campaign Fund under section 6096 of such code.
